messages.subject: Here We Go Again
messages.msgSnippet: Well, expect service at yahoo groups to get worse yet once again. Lynda Dear Yahoo! Groups Members, Yahoo! Groups is undergoing a fixer-upper. The service will
messages.messageBody:
Well, expect service at yahoo groups to get worse yet once again.

Lynda

Dear Yahoo! Groups Members,

Yahoo! Groups is undergoing a fixer-upper.

The service will be down for a system upgrade Sat Oct 13 from approximately
10PM until 2AM PST (GMT-8). During this time the web site will be
unavailable and all email will be queued. All email sent during this time
should be delivered within a few hours of resumed service, but further
delays may occur due to backlog. Please do not resend email to your group.

I apologize for any inconvience this may cause.


The Yahoo! Groups Plumber
